DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled clinical trial investigate effectiveness , safety tolerability platelet-rich plasma ( PRP ) injection treatment patellar tendinopathy adult 18-50 year age . Subjects randomly assign three parallel treatment group : 1 . Leukocyte-rich PRP injection + exercise 2 . Leukocyte-poor PRP injection + exercise 3 . Saline injection + exercise ( control ) Primary endpoint ( 1 ) number ( rate ) severity adverse event report patient study physician first 12 week initiation treatment , ( 2 ) patient-rated tolerability treatment ; ( 3 ) change function ( VISA score ) treatment success ( global improvement scale ) six month post-injection exercise protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Plasma Injections Plus Exercise Patellar Tendinopathy
